title: I need an experienced designer who designs the cover of my eBook
snippet:
I have written an eBook that is about presenting in TV, Radio and Event. Now I need someone who designs an eBook cover that has a clear attention-grabbing focus and tells the customer what it is about.

There already exists a logo and the colors are set in a styleguide (s. attached document). The cover of the eBook shall be design with these guidelines.

I will send you all the other informations regarding texts, pictures etc. in a briefing if we work together. 

I will need all rights so that I can sell the eBook as often as I want to. I also want to have the right to change the text and the design so I can use it for other eBooks, too.
